column5: Large, fully furnished private room/bath with access to large kitchen. Only 5 mins. to La Cantera, Rim, Palladium Theatre, many Restaurants, Six Flags, Top Golf, and about 15 min to SeaWorld. TV/wifi included. Beautiful scenic view. Two extra bedrooms available if need be - its one bedroom with twin beds & another bedroom with full size bed both share a jack & jill bath, each room is paid separately, all big comfortable size rooms.
